cast.name: 朱丽叶特·刘易斯 Juliette Lewis
克劳斯·沃尔曼 Klaus Voormann

古斯塔夫·诺伦 Gustaf Norén

this_title: Mando Diao: Above and Beyond – MTV Unplugged
introduction: Above and Beyond – MTV Unplugged by the Swedish rock band Mando Diao is the CD and DVD recording of their Unplugged show on September 2, 2010 in Berlin. The track list contains acoustic versions of a variety of songs reaching from their first to their last album, and including their most popular songs as well as new ones. Losing My Mind and No More Tears were performed in public for the first time during the show.Juliette Lewis, Ray Davies, Klaus Voormann and Lana Del Rey are performing as guests. Mando Diao's former keyboarder, Daniel Haglund, also appears as guest and additional musician.
foreign_title: Mando Diao: Above and Beyond – MTV Unplugged
